wikipedia_page.main: Greg Cackett (born 14 November 1989) is a British bobsledder. He competed in the four-man event at the 2018 Winter Olympics.

response: In November 2017 at Park City, Tasker finished third in a four-man World Cup race alongside Bradley Hall, Joel Fearon and Greg Cackett.
